title: Ray Charles, Modern Sounds in Country and Western Music Vols 1&a
description:
Ray Charles, Modern Sounds in Country and Western Music Vols 1&2
Originally released 1962 - 1995 cdrip - flac
This torrent combines Volumes ! & 2, released 6 months apart in 1962.

Regarded by many critics as Charles's best studio album, Modern Sounds in Country and Western Music has been considered by several music writers to be a landmark album in American music. The album's integration of soul and country music bent racial barriers in popular music, amid the height of the African-American civil rights struggle. In the process of recording the album, Charles became one of the first African-American musicians to exercise complete artistic control over his own recording career. The album has been called one of the greatest albums of all time by publications such as Rolling Stone and Time. - Wikipedia
This torrent combines Volumes ! & 2, released 6 months apart in 1962.
